title: Equality/Justice vs Merciful Accommodation, Moral Vanguard vs. Rebels. The Issues Below Church SSM
description:
For most of you your Binary Shibbolethic Filter is already triggered, but there are issues beneath this fight, easily visible in the Christian Reformed Church that are worth while exploring regardless of where you come down on these issues because they repeat themselves in other issues.

Marriage Equality Destroying Protestant Churches https://youtu.be/IXgdRQgZNJE
All One Body Comments on CRC Voices https://paulvanderklay.me/2021/09/14/more-a1b-conversations-on-voices/
CRC Voices Link https://groups.io/g/crc-voices
The Righteous Mind https://amzn.to/3EqbHsq
All One Body Website https://www.allonebody.org/
Dallas Willard Nature and Necessity of Worldview https://youtu.be/X6hwsG7AUZ0
Tim Keller and Kevin De Young Human sexuality https://youtu.be/3JWQPFvtzck
@Jonathan Pageau Parasitic Story Telling https://youtu.be/gFxu3Q71NvE
Dordt U Student files suit against Department of Education https://dordtdiamond.com/2021/09/13/why-i-filed-a-lawsuit-and-why-it-matters-for-the-future/
Denominations with McDonald's Level Locality https://youtu.be/X_I8oXjmvAI

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/feUJvabj
Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. 

https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

Powerpoints of Monologue videos are available for Patrons at https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://odysee.com/@paulvanderklay

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

To support Paul's work by supporting his church give here. https://tithe.ly/give?c=2160640
